title: MNF Recap Brees Record; Epic All-Decade Team
itunes:title: MNF Recap Brees Record; Epic All-Decade Team
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling and Gregg Rosenthal recap the record-setting Monday Night Football game between the Saints and Colts (6:52) and then break down all of the news in the NFL. The Ford family states that Patricia will be safe with Black Monday right around the corner (21:39)and Josh Gordon is suspended indefinitely (29:36). The heroes create their all-decade team and argue for who shouldn't make the list. (44:04)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
